Title: Review of Blockchain Frameworks and Platforms
abstract: Development of blockchain technology and the spheres where they can be applied has led to the increasing demand for a necessary platform to meet all the requirements. To meet these requirements new frameworks and platforms have appeared. Tasks set for a certain blockchain greatly determine the choice of design and its implementation. For example presence or absence of tokens; whether it is documentary, private or public; for banking sphere or social need. All these criteria should be taken into account while creating a blockchain thus saving time and money. The article has reviewed and analyzed the existing solutions and what models they are appropriate for.
